00014 #ifndef ULIB_RPC_PARSER_H
00015 #define ULIB_RPC_PARSER_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/net/rpc/rpc.h>
00018 #include <ulib/net/rpc/rpc_envelope.h>
00019 
00026 class URPCObject;
00027 
00028 class U_EXPORT URPCParser {
00029 public:
00030 
00031         // Check for memory error
00032         U_MEMORY_TEST
00033 
00034         // Allocator e Deallocator
00035         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00036         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00037 
00038         // COSTRUTTORI
00039 
00040         URPCParser(UVector<UString>* arg = 0)
00041                 {
00042                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, URPCParser, "%p", arg)
00043 
00044                 if (arg == 0)
00045                         {
00046                         URPC::allocate();
00047 
00048                         arg = URPC::rpc_info;
00049                         }
00050 
00051                 envelope.arg = arg;
00052                 }
00053 
00054         ~URPCParser()
00055                 {
00056                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, URPCParser)
00057 
00058                 clearData();
00059 
00060                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(envelope.arg)
00061 
00062                 delete envelope.arg;
00063                 }
00064 
00065         // SERVICES
00066 
00067         void clearData();
00068 
00069         UVector<UString>& getArgument()  { return *(envelope.arg); }
00070 
00071         UString getNsName() const                       { return envelope.nsName; }      // return the name of namespace qualified
00072                                                                                                                                                                                         // element information
00073         UString getMethodName() const           { return envelope.methodName; }  // return the name of the method
00074                                                                                                                                                                                         // the caller wants to execute
00075 
00076         // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00077         // Given a URPCObject this calls the appropriate URPCMethod.
00078         // If this fails, ask for a URPCFault. Returns a RPC send-ready response
00079         // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00080         // bContainsFault: Indicates if the returned string contains a fault
00081         // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 
00083         UString processMessage(const UString& msg, URPCObject& object, bool& bContainsFault);
00084 
00085         // DEBUG
00086 
00087 #ifdef DEBUG
00088         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 protected:
00092         URPCEnvelope envelope;
00093 
00094 private:
00095         URPCParser(const URPCParser&)            {}
00096         URPCParser& operator=(const URPCParser&) { return *this; }
00097 };
00098 
00099 #endif
